title: General Training Set 25 — Fitness Class & Shared Workspaces
description: Informal letter about joining a local fitness class and an essay on shared office spaces for freelancers.

task1.title: Letter to a neighbour about a fitness class
task1.prompt: A new fitness studio has opened in your neighbourhood and is offering a free introductory class. Write a letter to your neighbour inviting them to attend with you. In your letter: describe the class and why it interests you, explain how attending together could be beneficial, and suggest arrangements for meeting before or after the class.
hints: Keep a friendly and encouraging tone for a neighbour.
Include practical information such as time, location, or instructor style.
Offer a clear plan for coordinating attendance.

task2.title: Opinion essay — Shared workspaces for freelancers
task2.prompt: Freelancers increasingly choose shared office spaces instead of working from home. Do the advantages of shared workspaces outweigh the disadvantages?
outline: Introduction: introduce the trend and state your view on whether benefits outweigh drawbacks.
Body paragraph 1: discuss advantages such as networking, structure, or amenities.
Body paragraph 2: consider disadvantages like cost, distractions, or commuting.
Conclusion: reaffirm your opinion and offer recommendations for freelancers.
